about_the_game:
The first of its kind! A first for VR! An intense online multiplayer deathmatch game where you must dig through the earth and excavate weapons to battle your enemies!

Multiplayer Deathmatch


Play online in 4 player deathmatches with opponents from around the world!
You'll have to watch for enemies from every direction in these intense VR battles!
Everyone else is your enemy! Score more kills by the end of each 5 minute match to win!

Masks and Gloves


Get special new masks and gloves every day you log in!
Match up your preferred mask and gloves and get ready to Dig 4 Destruction!

Match Waiting Room Chat


Practice at the garage firing range or chat with your opponents while waiting for each match to begin!
Play catch or chess with opponents, take pictures, light fireworks, it's a free for all of fun!
However, once the match begins, they're all enemies, so don't get too attached!

*Matching with Dig 4 Destruction as sold on Oculus Store is not supported.

name: Dig 4 Destruction

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $59.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $59.99 USD.

package_groups.title: Buy Dig 4 Destruction Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970、AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 2m area required

short_description: The first of its kind! A first for VR! An intense online multiplayer deathmatch game where you must dig through the earth and excavate weapons to battle your enemies! *Coming Soon to the Oculus Touch!
